title: Nisus Finance invests in society self-redevelopment project in Mumbai’s Ghatkopar - Economic Times
content: Nisus Finance invests in society self-redevelopment project in Mumbai’s Ghatkopar  Economic Times
description: With this Nisus Finance & Investment has forayed into society self-redevelopment projects in the countrys commercial capital. Nisus Finance has invested Rs 25 crore in Vishwasangam, an affordable society self-redevelopment project, which is a joint development by two neighbouring societies in the Pestom Sagar location of Ghatkopar.
